section.title: Terminology and notation
section.p:
The following definitions all apply to an m \times n matrix.
column space columnspace matrixcolumn space
the subspace of \R^m formed by the span of the columns of the matrix
row space rowspace matrixrow space
the subspace of R^n formed by the span of the rows of the matrix
null space nullspace matrixnull space
the subspace of R^n formed by the solution set of the homogeneous system with that matrix as the coefficient matrix
nullity nullityof a matrix matrixnullity
the dimension of the null space of the matrix
